justification: Identifies B’s desire for a workhorse but ignores B’s preference for proven vets and fading run-heavy offenses; Robinson is a rookie in a low-pass (likely run-heavy) setup. Trade asks B to give a Tier 2 WR (Torres) plus depth for a Tier 5 RB—hurts B’s WR floor and is value-skewed. Mislabels Robinson as A’s “top asset.” Rationale is brief and not evidence-based; acceptance probability is unrealistic.
